website_summaries.verdict: A quality sunscreen that offers ample protection for most users and provides long wear without leaving skin feeling oily.
pros: An oil-free formula that earns praise for how well it stays put in spite of water and sweat
Doesn't have the tendency to leave a white cast once completely rubbed into the skin
cons: A few consumers reported skin irritation after using it

customer_reviews.title: Jack Black's Best Product
customer_reviews.text: Sheer for a zinc formula, matte, well formulated with antioxidants, and no fragrance. Jack Black makes a lot of gimmicky products with loads of "all natural" irritating, fragrant ingredients. Products with menthol, mint, and citrus seem good on paper. But in practice they make skin burn and cause redness. Luckily this Sun Guard is all performance and no gimmicks. It is a good price for the amount of product you get. In the world of high end sunscreens, this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Decoratin4Fun!

customer_reviews.title: Jack Black is the Best
customer_reviews.text: There are many sunscreens out there, but this is my current favorite. I'm in the sun all day fishing most days of the year, and applying this product BEFORE I leave the house (allowing it to soak in) keeps me from burning. It is also the only product I've tried (besides the baby stuff) that does not burn my eyes as I sweat during the day. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hagood

customer_reviews.title: Superb protection, quality ingredients and easily absorbed

customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen goes on easily and seems light on the skin. It protects through heavy sweating and doesn't cause a rash. My husband uses it for his long (5 hour) bike rides, applies it once and doesn't burn. I like how lightweight it is - it feels lighter than regular face lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: I work outside & use this everyday...
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the only sunscreen that I've tried that felt hydrating yet hasn't left me feeling oily & smelly. I am a roadside service driver working for AAA & I'm outside 8-12 hours a day. I can feel a huge difference in the sun hitting my skin after applying this sunscreen. Absolutely very happy & I'll definitely keep using in.

customer_reviews.title: Lotion hater likes it the best.
customer_reviews.text: My husband hates oils, lotions, conditioners, chapstick... Anything that feels like that on his skin (has since he was a baby). This is WAY better then most sunscreens for him. He doesn't love it, but compared to all the others this is the best we have found. He even forgets its there after about 1/2 hour which is a huge improvement. Works great to as he is a ginger and burns easily. Lasts a few hours usually in strait sun and lots of heat.

customer_reviews.title: The answer for skin sensitive to sunscreens?
customer_reviews.text: If your face is sensitive to sunscreen, you have your own back story about failed hypoallergenic products and sensitive-skin products --I don't need to share mine. That said, I've put this on every morning for over a month and it feels good (do you know that need to go wash a suncreen off immediately?) - and over the course of the day, there's no stinging or reddening. It works, and I want to put it on.

product_meta.title: Jack Black , Oil-Free Sun Guard SPF 45 Sunscreen, 4 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
For the performance-minded individual, protecting your skin from harmful UVA/UVB rays while being active is vital. Jack Black Sun Guard SPF 45 is an oil-free, vitamin-enriched, water- and sweat-resistant sunscreen lotion that offers superior broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection and is absorbed quickly without greasy or heavy residue. Our Performance Remedy products are formulated for extreme conditions. Sun Guard forms an SPF 45 barrier of protection and stays on through intense physical activity in and out of the water. It does not drip into your eyes and stays on for extended periods.

Jack Black’s Performance Remedy line contains high-quality ingredients that work together to effectively protect skin from damage. Zinc oxide provides effective, non-irritating physical protection from UVB and UVA. Octinoxate is a sunscreen that provides protection specifically from UVB rays, while octisalate protects against UVB rays. Inactive ingredients, including vitamin C and organic calendula flower are added to fight free radicals while calming and soothing irritated skin.

Jack Black products feature certified organic ingredients and are always cruelty free and dermatologist tested. Apply Jack Black Sun Guard generously and evenly 30 minutes before going out in the sun. Reapply after heavy perspiration, towel drying, or 60 minutes of sun exposure.
